item.description:
LEGAL SEMINAR:
Join us for an engaging evening of discussion and a presentation on Legal Issues facing Entrepreneurial Ventures: Learn about common pitfalls, protecting Intellectual Property, Contracts, Employment challenges, Partnerships and Stock Options. Ask Questions and network with your colleagues at this inviting presentation!

Revolve Nation Boston is the largest community of entrepreneurs and business owners in the city of Boston, offering networking, discussion groups, seminars, business plan hot-seats, and more! Join us here, where professionals and entrepreneurs meet in mutual support of business to network, socialize, learn, and promote a thriving community of entrepreneurs. Wine and snacks provided!

SPONSORS:
Revolve Law: www.revolvethis.com
Exemplar Law Partners: www.exemplarlaw.com

Refreshments and Snacks Provided
item.name: SEMINAR: Legal Issues for Entrepreneurial Ventures * * * * *
